mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservationform (reserv_num, users_id, space_num, reserv_date, reserv_time, reserv_comment, reserv_count, totalMoney, reserv_reg) VALUES(reservationform_seq.NEXTVAL, #{users_id}, #{space_num}, #{reserv_date}, #{reserv_time}, #{reserv_comment}, #{reserv_count}, #{totalMoney}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result2.* FROM (SELECT reservationform.reserv_num, result1.cate_num, reservationform.users_id, reservationform.space_num, result1.space_name, reservationform.reserv_date, reservationform.reserv_time, reservationform.reserv_comment, reservationform.reserv_count, reservationform.totalMoney, reservationform.reserv_reg, rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT seller_space.*, cate_num FROM seller_space INNER JOIN space_category ON seller_space.cate_name=space_category.cate_name)result1 INNER JOIN reservationform ON result1.space_num=reservationform.space_num WHERE users_num=(SELECT MAX(users_num) FROM seller_space WHERE users_num = (select users_num FROM space_users WHERE id=#{users_id})))result2 WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM reservationform INNER JOIN seller_space ON reservationform.space_num=seller_space.space_num WHERE seller_space.users_num = (SELECT MAX(users_num) FROM seller_space WHERE users_num = (select users_num FROM space_users WHERE id = #{users_id}))
